problem_text_cn: 如图,△ABC≌△BAD,点A和点B,点C和点D是对应点．如果AB=6厘米,BD=5厘米,AD=4厘米,那么BC的长是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, △ABC ≌ △BAD, point A and point B, point C and point D are corresponding points. If AB = N_0 cm, BD = N_1 cm, AD = N_2 cm, then the length of BC is ()
raw_answer: 试题分析:因为△ABC≌△BAD,所以BC=AD=4cm.故选A.
